    37 [+] mata block (24 lines) 
    • mata:
version 13

void check_cns(string scalar C, vce, coef) {

	real scalar i, k
	real vector bad
	real matrix Cns
	string scalar msg
	
	msg = "{err}{p 0 4 2}invalid constraint on %s; only constant-value "
	msg = msg + "constraint on %s allowed with %s{p_end}\n"
	
	Cns = st_matrix(C)
	k = cols(Cns)
	bad = (rowsum(Cns[.,1..k-1]):>1) :* Cns[.,k]
	for (i=1; i<=rows(bad); i++) {
		if (bad[i]) {
			printf(msg,coef,coef,vce)
			exit(198)
		}
	}
}
end
    All properties 
    key content
    command mata
    comment block (24 lines)


    62 [+] exit

    • Content

      *! version 1.0.1  10apr2013
program define _xt_check_cns, eclass

	version 13
	
	syntax [ , vce(passthru) cns(string) names(string) ]
	
	if "`cns'" == "" {
		exit 0
	}
	
	tempname hold bt Vt
	
	_est hold `hold', nullok restore
	
	local coef lnsig2u:_cons
	
	local k : list sizeof names
	mat `bt' = J(1,`k',0)
	mat colnames `bt' = `names'
	mat rownames `bt' = "y1"
	mat `Vt' = J(`k',`k',0)
	mat colnames `Vt' = `names'
	mat rownames `Vt' = `names'
	ereturn post `bt' `Vt'
	makecns `cns', nocnsnotes
	if "`e(Cns)'"=="matrix" {
		tempname C
		matrix `C' = e(Cns)
		mata: check_cns("`C'","`vce'","`coef'")
	}
	
	_est unhold `hold'
	
end

mata:
version 13

void check_cns(string scalar C, vce, coef) {

	real scalar i, k
	real vector bad
	real matrix Cns
	string scalar msg
	
	msg = "{err}{p 0 4 2}invalid constraint on %s; only constant-value "
	msg = msg + "constraint on %s allowed with %s{p_end}\n"
	
	Cns = st_matrix(C)
	k = cols(Cns)
	bad = (rowsum(Cns[.,1..k-1]):>1) :* Cns[.,k]
	for (i=1; i<=rows(bad); i++) {
		if (bad[i]) {
			printf(msg,coef,coef,vce)
			exit(198)
		}
	}
}
end

exit
